profile_card.bio: Still studying at Silesian University of Technology - Computer Sciense at the Faculty of Applied Mathematics. Currently exploring frontend development with React, but I’ve also built projects ranging from a desktop school management system to Bash scripts for setting up a TFTP server to boot a Ubuntu ISO. I’m familiar with technologies such as JavaScript, C#, C++, Python, and SQL. Currently, I’m aspiring to secure a frontend developer internship to further grow as a software developer.

LinkedIn.description: Find me on LinkedIn, link is put in the About me section.
